main.name: Jollof Rice
main.description: Jollof rice is a very common dish prepared in many African countries and each recipe differs depending on the nation.
direction: Blend tomatoes, red bell peppers, habanero peppers, large red onions until consistency is smooth and set aside.
Wash the rice thoroughly to rid off starch and set aside.
To a medium-sized pot on medium heat, heat canola oil and butter.
Throw in chopped onions and allow to fry for about 5 mins or untill redness starts to fade.
Pour in tomato paste and allow to fry for about 10-15 minutes, stirring continously to avoid burning.
Add in your blended mixture, crayfish, Maggi, Cayenne & Black pepper, White pepper, Bay leaves, Curry powder, garlic, thyme. Mix and fry for about 30 minutes, continously stirring to avoid burning.
Add chicked stock and salt. Mix and allow to cook for an additional 10mins
Add in washed rice and a bit of water (if necessary), and reduce heat to low.
Cover pot with aluminum foil, to avoid heat from escaping through lid.
Cook rice on low heat for abour 30 mins.
Once cooked, mix thoroughly to combine ingredients.
Cover and let cook for an additional 10 mins.
To get the party Jollof flavor, turn up the heat and let the rice burn for about 3 mins.
Be careful with this step, so you don't burn the whole rice

main.name: Vanilla Iced White Chocolate Mocha
main.description: Vanilla Iced White Chocolate mocha recipe is inspired by Starbucks white chocolate mocha.
main.keyword: coffee, starbucks white chocolate mocha twist, vanilla coffee, white chocolate mocha
direction: To a medium sized mason jar, add hot espresso, vanilla icecream and white chocolate sauce. Mix well until icecream fully melts in espresso.
Add in your cup of ice and milk. Stir until well-mixed.
Add some whipped cream topping.
Serve and enjoy!

main.name: Bread and Egg Toast
main.description: Bread and Egg toast is the perfect meal to prepare when you are on the go and need some snacks for the day.
main.keyword: bread and egg toast, breakfast recipe, french toast
direction: To a large frying pan on medium-high heat, heat up your olive oil.
Crack 4 eggs into a wide bowl and add in your spices (salt, pepper, oregano). Whisk with a fork until fully combined.
Drop-in a slice of bread into the mixture, coating both sides of the bread in the mixture.
Lay your bread onto the pan and fry. once the end of the bread starts to brown, flip over the bread and fry the other side until lightly brown.
Repeat the same steps for the other slices.
Drizzle your melted chocolcate chips on the stacked bread.
Serve and enjoy!
